text: [chopping]
Hi everybody! Today I make some
side dish with this! It's called "doljaban" (seaweed).
It smells like, flavour like "kim."
I'm going to use around around half amount 100 grams, 3 cloves of garlic.
3 green onions.
Put this into this bowl.
Add this: 1 third cup of water.
...and soy sauce
3 tablespoons, and 1 tablespoon
sugar. If you don't like to use sugar
you can replace it with honey. Mix this well until
sugar is dissolved well.
While you are mixing, this
sauce is going to be more and more tasty because this
sauce mixture is going to be garlic and green onion flavours
going to be mixed together. Sesame oil! Lots of sesame oil,
around 3 tablespoons.
Mix this! That's all! I will use this disposable gloves
and first...
just you squish this like this.
Lots of this seasoning mixture is on the bottom. Turn over like this.
And roasted sesame seeds, around 2 or 3 tablespoons.
This is going to be a really really delicious side dish.
Done!
Keep this in the refrigerator and enjoy until it
runs out. Mmmm! Exactly this one container fits.
I'm going to bring my rice.
Let me taste it! First, rice.
Delicious. But one thing warning....
after eating this, be careful!
All the leaves between your teeth! Like this! Hahaha!
So don't forget to brush your teeth after.
So this ratio of soy sauce is so delicious. Hwaa, tasty!
Enjoy my recipe! See you next time! Uh oh!
What we made today? What did we make? "Doljaban muchim." Bye!
